[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||4px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Adding value to the prosperity of our country”

OUR COMPETENCE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”4px||205px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/agriculture-portrait-1-scaled.jpg” title_text=”agriculture portrait (1)” _builder_version=”4.5.7″ background_enable_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” filter_brightness__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_brightness__hover=”92%”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”Lato|||||||#ffffff|” link_text_color=”#004b4f” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]

GMCI is a world-renowned global manufacturer of agricultural mineral materials. Combined with guidance from our technical staff, mineral products allow us to provide our clients with solutions customized to the particular

GMCI offer a range of raw material minerals to choose from, so that we can precisely align the best approach with the specifications of our customers. Talc, Carbonate, Calcium Carbonate, Kaolin, Calcium Sulphate, Hydrated Lime, Sodium Hydroxide (Caustic Soda), Titanium Dioxide is produced according to international regulatory standards under clean and controlled conditions of manufacture.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

” MAKE AGRICULTURE MORE COMPETITIVE AND PRODUCTIVE “

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The broad variety of healthy and environmentally sustainable farming technologies from GMCI ensures higher farm yields and better usage of resources with the extreme small land capital accessible for agriculture, we are seeking alternatives to the problem of feeding the rising population of the world.

Agrochemicals and farm goods are widely referred to in agriculture for pesticides, including insecticides, herbicides, fungicides and bactericides. There is a worldwide tightly controlled usage of farm minerals. GMCI is therefore committed to complying with government regulations and the highest safety standards in the storage and management of agricultural minerals.

We aim to be a constructive and innovative force for saving the atmosphere by actively searching for means for conserving resources, mitigating energy use, lowering pollution and reducing waste.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/sky-blue-texture-1-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.56)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”130px||130px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”85%” module_alignment=”center” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”38px” text_font_size_phone=”27px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]
